text: The 29th TVyNovelas Awards, is an Academy of special awards to the best of soap operas and TV shows. The awards ceremony took place on March 6, 2011 in the Forum Mundo Imperial, Acapulco, Guerrero. The ceremony was televised in the Mexico by Canal de las estrellas. Jacqueline Bracamontes and Alan Tacher hosted the show. Para volver a amar won 7 awards including Best Telenovela of the Year, the most for the evening. Other winners Soy tu dueña won 3 awards, Cuando me enamoro won 2 awards and Teresa and Niña de mi corazón won one each. == Summary of awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto;" ! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Telenovela !! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Nominations !! style="background- color:#EEDD82;" | Awards |- |Cuando me enamoro ||6||2 |- |Llena de amor ||7||0 |- |Mar de amor ||4||0 |- |Niña de mi corazón ||3||1 |- |Para volver a amar ||11||7 |- |Soy tu dueña ||11||3 |- |Teresa ||7||1 |- |Zacatillo, un lugar en tu corazón ||5||0 |} == Winners and nominees == === Novelas === Fernando Colunga, winner for Best Actor. Rocío Banquells, Winner for Best Antagonist Actress Alejandro Camacho, Winner for Best Leading Actor Alejandra Barros, Winner for Best Co-lead Actress Enrique Iglesias with Juan Luis Guerra, Winner for Best Musical Theme and awarded with Special Award for his Musical Career {| class="wikitable" |- !
